wikipedia_page.main: Percy Weston Heward (13 December 1882 – 6 May 1948) was an independent English Christian evangelist, Biblical scholar, author and principal of a "Bible Training College" in London. In 1908 he founded a movement which aimed to "literally carry out the word of the Gospel" and re-establish Churches/Assemblies according to the New Testament pattern. He became the leading teacher of a gathering of Christians in Forest Gate, East London, which was in association with a number of other similar assemblies in England.
